mapper.select: select count(*) from cart where id = #{id}

select cartno, id, contentsno, pname, amount, price, total, r from (select cartno, id, contentsno, pname, amount, price, (price*amount) as total, rownum r from cart where id=#{id})
where r >= #{sno} and r <= #{eno}
mapper.delete: delete from cart where cartno = #{cartno} and contentsno = #{contentsno}
mapper.insert: insert into cart(cartno, id, contentsno, pname, amount, price) values((select nvl(max(cartno),0)+1 from cart), #{id}, #{contentsno}, #{pname}, #{amount}, #{price})
